thread.title: Maye Rivera
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Maye Rivera

author: Maye Rivera
title: Maye Rivera
text: I have used Costa Rican Vacations to help me plan at least six of our trips to Costa Rica. The last four trips I got in touch with Rebecca Anderson, who now knows our preferences in hotels and other vacation travel needs. I really appreciate her knowledge of the country and the properties she recommends. She really works hard to meet the needs of my family and friends. Thank you!
